metadata.title: ELSA-2023-6474:  podman security, bug fix, and enhancement update (MODERATE)
metadata.description:
[2:4.6.1-5.0.1]
- Drop nmap-ncat requirement and skip ignore-socket test case [Orabug: 34117404]
